verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of David.) Rescue <WH2502> me, O Lord, <WH3068> from evil <WH7451> men; <WH376> Preserve <WH5341> me from violent <WH2555> men, <WH120>
Who <WH834> devise <WH2803> evil <WH7451> things <WH7451> in [their] hearts; <WH3820> They continually <WH3605> <WH3117> stir <WH9075> up wars. <WH4421>
They sharpen <WH8150> their tongues <WH3956> as a serpent; <WH5175> Poison <WH2534> of a viper <WH5919> is under <WH8478> their lips. <WH8193> Selah. <WH5542>

Keep <WH8104> me, O Lord, <WH3068> from the hands <WH3027> of the wicked; <WH7563> Preserve <WH5341> me from violent <WH2555> men, <WH376> Who <WH834> have purposed <WH2803> to trip <WH1760> up my feet. <WH6471>

The proud <WH1343> have hidden <WH2934> a trap <WH6341> for me, and cords; <WH9112> They have spread <WH6566> a net <WH7568> by the wayside; <WH4570> They have set <WH7896> snares <WH4170> for me. Selah. <WH5542>
I said <WH559> to the Lord, <WH3068> "Thou art my God; <WH410> Give <WH238> ear, <WH238> O Lord, <WH3068> to the voice <WH6963> of my supplications. <WH8469>
"O God <WH3068> the Lord, <WH136> the strength <WH5797> of my salvation, <WH3444> Thou hast covered <WH5526> my head <WH7218> in the day <WH3117> of battle. <WH5402>
"Do not grant, <WH5414> O Lord, <WH3068> the desires <WH3970> of the wicked; <WH7563> Do not promote <WH6329> his [evil] device, <WH2162> [lest] they be exalted. <WH7311> Selah. <WH5542>
"As for the head <WH7218> of those who surround <WH5437> me, May the mischief <WH5999> of their lips <WH8193> cover <WH3680> them.
"May burning <WH784> coals <WH1513> fall <WH4131> upon them; May they be cast <WH5307> into the fire, <WH784> Into deep <WH4113> pits <WH4113> from which they cannot <WH1077> rise. <WH6965>
"May a slanderer <WH376> <WH3956> not be established <WH3559> in the earth; <WH776> May evil <WH9563> hunt <WH6679> the violent <WH2555> man <WH376> speedily. <WH4073>"
I know <WH3045> that the Lord <WH3068> will maintain <WH6213> the cause <WH1779> of the afflicted, <WH6031> And justice <WH4941> for the poor. <WH34>
Surely <WH389> the righteous <WH6662> will give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to Thy name; <WH8034> The upright <WH3477> will dwell <WH3427> in Thy presence. <WH6440>
